Class AnimatedSprite

java.lang.Object
sprites.AnimatedSprite
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
BanditDeath, BanditSprite, BatmanDeath, BatmanSprite, FireballSprite, HealingVortex, PlayerSprite, SkeletonDeath, SkeletonSprite, SlashSwirl, SlimeDeath, SlimeSprite
public abstract class AnimatedSprite extends Object implements Sprite
Abstract class for animated sprites

    • AnimatedSprite

      public AnimatedSprite(String spriteSheetPath, int ticksPerFrame, int width, int height, int xPosition, int yPosition)
      Create a new animated sprite
      Parameters:
      spriteSheetPath - path to the sprite sheet file
      ticksPerFrame - number of ticks per frame
      width - width of the sprite
      height - height of the sprite
      xPosition - x position
      yPosition - y position
